com.cmput301fa16t5.legendary_telegram

Class GsonController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301fa16t5.legendary_telegram.GsonController

  • public class GsonController
extends java.lang.Object
    Gson controller class. All methods are static; no objects needed, no constructor. Contains: A method to check if a file exists on disk. A method to delete a file from disk. A method to load a User Object from disk. A method to save a User Object to disk.
    Author:
    kgmills

      GsonController()

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfExists

        public static boolean checkIfExists(java.lang.String userName,
                                    android.content.Context context)
        Checks if a file corresponding to a given username exists. Used simply to check if a username is unique, locally.
        Parameters:
        userName - The username as a string.
        context - Needed to get file list.
        Returns:
        True of the file exists. False otherwise.

      • deleteOldUserName

        public static void deleteOldUserName(java.lang.String oldName,
                                     android.content.Context context)
        Deletes an old user name.
        Parameters:
        oldName - String of the old user.
        context - Needed to use Gson.

      • loadUserInfo

        public static User loadUserInfo(java.lang.String userName,
                                android.content.Context context)
        Uses GSON to load a user object related to a given username from disk.
        Parameters:
        userName - The username as a string.
        context - Context needed to use GSON.
        Returns:
        The User object, if successful. Null otherwise.

      • saveUserToDisk

        public static void saveUserToDisk(User user,
                                  android.content.Context context)
        Uses GSON to save a User object to disk
        Parameters:
        user - The User object to be saved.
        context - Context needed to use GSON.
